ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/beautify.xcodeproj -scheme beautify -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -arch x86_64 -quiet
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 11

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project ios/beautify.xcodeproj -scheme beautify -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 11
